channel.title: Sheriff/Paladin & Mm/CL
channel.description:
I have a question. I don't know if there is an answer to it or not.
Let's say for example on a night you investigate / check faith of a person, IF the mastermind / cult leader turns them on the exact same night, will you be given the information prior to their conversion as BD?
Or will you be given up to date information of them being converted? It's something that I really feel is useful to know - It could make or break the success rate of Sheriff + Paladins?
Any thoughts / information people have would be appreicated.

item.title: Sheriff/Paladin & Mm/CL
item.dc:creator: Ben_Pollard
item.description:
I just find that when I’m Sheriff, I don’t tend to look at the same person unless it’s been 3-4-5 nights.
So if N1 someone is BD (But gets converted) chances are it will get missed & by that time you could have already lost.

I mean, it’s not ridiculous I just think small things should be put in to let new people (or unsure people like myself) know this sort of thing.
